ai-patthana15.57:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.57:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.57:2.1_0: A unskillful thought doesn’t give rise to thought. ...
ai-patthana15.57:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.57:2.1_3: What is an unshakable, in the three ways?
